text: lqd abtgha almunafiqun fitnat almuminin ean dinahum wsdhm ean sabil allah min qabl ghzw (tbwk), wakashf amrhm, wsrrafu lak -ayha alnby- al'umur fi 'ibtal ma jit bh, kama faealuu yawm (ahd) wayawm (alkhndq), wdbbaru lak alkyd hataa ja' alnasr min eind allh, wa'aeazu jndh wnsr dynh, wahum karihun lh
